styles.name: Photorealistic

styles.prompt: watercolor painting with soft washes of color and textured paper background

styles.prompt: digital painting concept art style, smooth gradients, painterly details

styles.prompt: comic book style illustration with thick black outlines and flat vibrant colors

styles.prompt: minimalist flat design with simple shapes and clean composition

styles.name: Fantasy Art
styles.prompt: epic fantasy illustration with magical lighting and ethereal atmosphere

styles.name: Sci-Fi / Futuristic Tech
styles.prompt: sci-fi theme with advanced technology and alien world, cool blue tones

styles.prompt: low-poly 3D render style, simple geometric shapes and flat colors

styles.name: Cubism
styles.prompt: cubist style with fragmented geometric forms, multiple perspectives, abstract structure

styles.prompt: pop surrealism style, playful uncanny visuals, bold colors, whimsical surreal elements

styles.prompt: art deco revival style with bold geometry, symmetry, rich colors, metallic accents

styles.name: Glitch Art

styles.prompt: retro futurism with vintage sci-fi aesthetics, neon grids, optimistic future vibe

styles.name: Vaporwave
styles.prompt: vaporwave style, pastel neon colors, retro digital nostalgia, 80s-90s internet aesthetic

styles.name: Art Nouveau
styles.prompt: art nouveau style with flowing organic lines, decorative patterns, elegant curves

styles.name: Expressionism
styles.prompt: expressionism with bold exaggerated colors, emotional intensity, expressive forms

styles.name: Pointillism

styles.prompt: pop art with bright flat colors, graphic outlines, commercial art energy

styles.name: Mixed-Media Collage
styles.prompt: mixed-media collage with layered textures, torn paper look, combined visual materials

styles.prompt: Y2K chrome aesthetic with metallic glossy surfaces, early-2000s digital futurism

styles.name: Digital Painting
styles.prompt: digital painting with smooth painterly brushwork, soft blended transitions, refined details, artistic shading
styles.description: Smooth painterly brushwork with refined details.

styles.name: Flat Design

styles.name: Stylized Realism
styles.prompt: stylized realism with controlled realism, enhanced facial structure, subtle exaggeration, clean artistic polish

styles.name: Matte Painting
styles.prompt: matte painting with cinematic painterly realism, soft atmospheric gradients, controlled lighting, depth and scale
